alert.note: Alert for Central Blue Mountains; Central Mountains of Oregon; Deschutes National Forest - minus Sisters Ranger District; Southern Blue and Strawberry Mountains; Wallowa District (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 03 at 6:46AM PDT until August 04 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR ABUNDANT LIGHTNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... .Thunderstorms capable of producing abundant lightning over portions of central and northeast Oregon are forecast on today and Friday. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 PM PDT FRIDAY FOR ABUNDANT LIGHTNING FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES OR611, OR640, OR642, OR644, AND OR645... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 611 Deschutes National Forest -minus Sisters Ranger District, 640 Central Mountains of Oregon, 642 Southern Blue and Strawberry Mountains, 644 Central Blue Mountains and 645 Wallowa District. * IMPACTS...Lightning with thunderstorms will increase the likelihood of new fire starts, especially in dry fuel beds. * OUTFLOW WINDS...Outflow winds gusting 25 to 40 mph could cause erratic fire behavior on pre-existing fires.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Central Blue Mountains; Central Mountains of Oregon; Deschutes National Forest - minus Sisters Ranger District; Southern Blue and Strawberry Mountains; Wallowa District
